column1: Traffic reports will resume Tuesday September 20 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions between Sunset Dr and Melrose Ave due to a damaged electric pole as a result of a collision.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD:
column4: Inbound traffic diverted to Melrose Ave.  Outbound traffic diverted to Sunset Dr or Cochran Rd.
